job.command: cd ${SUBMITTINGDIRECTORY} # setup 64b # setup gcc451 echo $INPUTFILE0 | grep ':' if (! $?) then set evtsFile = `echo $INPUTFILE0 | awk -F\: '{print $1}'` set f = `echo $INPUTFILE0 | awk -F\: '{print $2}'` set l = `echo $INPUTFILE0 | awk -F\: '{print $3}'` else set evtsFile = $INPUTFILE0; set f = 1 set l = 50000 endif echo "${evtsFile}" if (! -r ${evtsFile}) exit 1; set file = `basename $evtsFile .daq` set dir = `dirname $evtsFile`; set logFile = ${file}_${f}_${l}B.log set output = ${file}_${f}_${l}.event.root if ( -r $output) exit 0; root4star -q -b 'bfc.C('${f}','${l}',"RC.y2007,NoHistos,noRunco,noTags,-EvOut,KFVertex,StiCA","'${evtsFile}'","'${output}'")' >& ${logFile}
